The Oblitercons/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis:



The Oblitercons had finished digging a large enough hole in the middle of the 
Gobi Desert, in southern Mongolia.  It was 200 ft deep.  They loaded the 
crates one by one into Dark One, who landed with one crate at a time to the 
bottom of the hole.

When they were finished, they covered it up, and headed back for the Alliance 
base.

===

Koga Shuko watched Anubis and Hades enter the Newcomer's base. 
"Where is Gigatron and the Maximal?"

"Giga...oh!  The other guy.  He's bringing him.  He should be here any cycle."
Hades replied.
